text: Hey, hope your doing well, I just wanted to ask a quick question. I've been doing some sketches and designs, I've got roughly 3 so far I'm working on, I just wanted to check what did you mean by 'use pictures'? Did you mean in the sense of if I find a picture which I think would look good as an environment or something else?
I was thinking of photobash if you do want to draw that much. You can also attached image on the side of your drawings to show what you mean by certain bits

That makes sense, thanks :slightly_smiling_face: I was thinking of doing photobash as it might be quicker, I've never really done it before however so I might just experiment a little without spending too much time on it
